nodes.text: The Assimilators were cyborg warriors that were capable of reconstructing themselves with near anything, including the body parts of their victims. They were created by the Arkanian Renegades as part of their effort to overthrow the government of Arkania, the Arkanian Dominion. In retaliation, the techno-lords of the Dominion created Accelerated Transgenic Heuristic Abhorers.
